pathogenesis: Genetic factors, Brain injury, Infections, Vata aggravation

name: Diabetes
pathogenesis: Imbalance of Kapha and Vata affecting metabolism

treatments.description: Gudmar, Shilajit, Bitter gourd

name: Arthritis
pathogenesis: Imbalance of Kapha causing joint inflammation

treatments.description: Guggulu, Ashwagandha, Shallaki

name: Hypertension
pathogenesis: Imbalance of Pitta affecting blood circulation

treatments.description: Arjuna, Brahmi, Jatamansi

name: Asthma
pathogenesis: Imbalance of Kapha affecting respiratory system

treatments.description: Vasa, Kantakari, Tulsi

name: Anemia
pathogenesis: Imbalance of Pitta affecting blood formation

treatments.description: Lauha Bhasma, Amalaki, Mandura Bhasma

name: Madhumeha
pathogenesis: Kapha and Vata imbalance affecting metabolism and urinary system, leading to impaired glucose regulation.

treatments.description: Gudmar and Shilajit to regulate blood sugar and improve metabolism.

name: Gridhrasi
pathogenesis: Vata and Kapha affecting sciatic nerve, causing pain and mobility issues.

treatments.description: Nirgundi oil massage to relieve pain and inflammation.

name: Yakṣma
pathogenesis: Tridosha imbalance affecting respiratory system and immunity, leading to chronic infection.

treatments.description: Sitopaladi Churna and Tulsi for respiratory support and immunity.

name: Shiroroga
pathogenesis: Dosha imbalance affecting the head region, causing various types of headaches.

treatments.description: Brahmi and Jatamansi for mental clarity and headache relief.

name: Hridroga
pathogenesis: Dosha imbalance affecting the heart, leading to various cardiac manifestations.

treatments.description: Arjuna and Guggulu for heart health and circulation.

name: Grahani
pathogenesis: Impaired digestive fire (Agni) leading to malabsorption and digestive disorders.

treatments.description: Triphala and Ginger to improve digestion and regulate bowel movements.

name: Netraroga
pathogenesis: Dosha imbalance affecting the eyes, leading to various ocular disorders.

treatments.description: Triphala eye wash and rose water for eye health.

name: Karnaroga
pathogenesis: Dosha imbalance affecting the ears, leading to various auditory disorders.

treatments.description: Garlic oil and sesame oil for ear health.

name: Vatarakta
pathogenesis: Vata and Rakta (blood) imbalance causing inflammatory joint conditions.

treatments.description: Guggulu and Manjistha for blood purification and joint health.

name: Kasa
pathogenesis: Dosha imbalance affecting respiratory system, leading to various cough conditions.

treatments.description: Sitopaladi Churna and Talisadi Churna for respiratory health.

name: Atisara
pathogenesis: Dosha imbalance affecting digestive system, leading to frequent loose bowel movements.

treatments.description: Kutaja and Bilva for diarrhea control and digestive health.

name: Vibandha
pathogenesis: Vata imbalance causing obstruction in bowel movements and digestive tract.

treatments.description: Triphala and Haritaki for bowel regulation and Vata balance.

name: Bhagandara
pathogenesis: Vata and Kapha imbalance causing fistula formation in anal region.

treatments.description: Kshara Sutra therapy for fistula treatment.

name: Granthi
pathogenesis: Dosha imbalance causing abnormal tissue growth and lump formation.

treatments.description: Kanchanara Guggulu for lump reduction and tissue health.

name: Pandu
pathogenesis: Pitta imbalance affecting blood and liver, leading to anemia and jaundice.

treatments.description: Navayasa Loha and Punarnava for blood health and liver function.

name: Kamala
pathogenesis: Pitta imbalance affecting liver and bile, causing jaundice.

treatments.description: Punarnava and Guduchi for liver health and bile regulation.

name: Mutrakrichra
pathogenesis: Vata and Pitta imbalance affecting urinary system, causing dysuria.

treatments.description: Gokshura and Punarnava for urinary health and kidney function.

name: Mutraghata
pathogenesis: Vata imbalance causing obstruction in urinary flow and retention.

treatments.description: Gokshura and Varuna for urinary flow and prostate health.

name: Vriddhi
pathogenesis: Vata and Kapha imbalance causing scrotal enlargement and hydrocele.

treatments.description: Gokshura and Punarnava for scrotal health and fluid regulation.

name: Phiranga
pathogenesis: Tridosha imbalance causing chronic skin ulcers and syphilitic conditions.

treatments.description: Khadirarishta and Neem for skin purification and ulcer healing.

name: Rajayakshma
pathogenesis: Tridosha imbalance affecting respiratory system and immunity.

treatments.description: Sitopaladi Churna and Tulsi for respiratory support and immunity.

name: Kshaya
pathogenesis: Vata imbalance causing tissue wasting and emaciation.

treatments.description: Ashwagandha and Bala for strength and tissue building.

name: Visarpa
pathogenesis: Pitta imbalance causing spreading skin inflammation and eruptions.

treatments.description: Neem and Haridra for skin inflammation and Pitta balance.

name: Dadhru
pathogenesis: Kapha and Vata imbalance causing fungal skin infections.

treatments.description: Neem and Haridra for fungal infection and skin health.
